name: christmas tree gnome
notes:
crochet christmas gnome pattern.
crochet a handmade christmas decoration that will look fantastic on your bookshelves or fireplace mantle. why not put them under the christmas tree?
easy crochet christmas gift pattern for family and friends.


> for the free pattern [click here!][1]

you can also pair your christmas gnome with the other one from the crochet christmas gnome collection.
1. gingerman gnome pattern [here][2].
2. santa claus gnome pattern [here][3].
3. snowman gnome pattern [here][4].

******* this listing is for the digital pdf pattern, not the toy itself!

******** the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english!

in this christmas crochet gnome pattern, you will find step-by-step written instructions on how to crochet a scandinavian christmas tree gnome. also, we included plenty of pictures to help you through.

materials:
---- sport weight yarn or any yarn you have in your stash with appropriate crochet hook size
---- crochet hook size 2.5 mm
---- poly fiber fill for stuffing

return policy: due to the nature of this listing (digital download) we don't accept returns and don't refund orders!!!

if you have any questions regarding your purchase or pattern please contact us via direct message.

  [2]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/christmas-gnome-gingerman
  [3]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/christmas-gnome--santa-claus
  [4]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/snowman-gnome-14
